Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,102 @@ +import React, { useRef,useState,useEffect } from 'react' +import QrCreator from 'qr-creator' +import { getDatabase, ref, onValue,set,update, get} from "firebase/database"; +import db from "../firebase/db" +import Header from '../Header'; +function Create() { + const [currentView,setcurrentView]=useState("home") + const [id,setid]=useState(window.localStorage.getItem("custId")) + const [Qdata,setQdata]=useState("") + const [Udata,setUdata]=useState("") + const [preStatus,setpreStatus]=useState(-1) + console.log(id) + + + useEffect(()=> + {console.log("useeffect") + if(id!=null) + { + + const refr = ref(db, 'tempcust/'+id); + onValue(refr, (snapshot) => { + console.log("onval") + const data = snapshot.val(); + + setUdata(data); + if(data.read===true) + { + + onValue(ref(db,'queues/shopsq/'+data.shopSessionId), + (snapshot)=>{ + setQdata(snapshot.val()) + if(snapshot.val()!=0){ + if(snapshot.val()!=preStatus) + {console.log(Udata) + update(ref(db,'tempcust/'+id),{pos:Udata.pos-1}) + } + } + } + ) + setcurrentView("onQ") + } + + + }); + + + + } + + },[id]) + const img=useRef() + let get=()=>{ +let cid=Math.round(Math.random()*100000*3*2)+"queue"+Math.round(Math.random()*100000); +set(ref(db,"tempcust/"+cid),{read:false,shopSessionId:"",status:false,pos:0}) + QrCreator.render( + { + text:cid, + radius:1.0, + ecLevel:'H', + fill:"black", + background:"white", + size:128 + }, + document.querySelector('#qr-code') + ) +window.localStorage.setItem("custId",cid) +setid(cid) + + } + return ( +
+
+ {currentView==="home"? + <> +
+

+ + Show this QR Code

+
+
+
+ + + {/* {id!=null?:null} */} +
+
+ + + + +
+
:currentView==="onQ"?
+

Shop Name:{Qdata.name}

+

Your Position : {Udata.pos}

+

Queue Length : {Qdata.tot}

+
:null +} +
+ ) +} + +export default Create \ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
import React, { useRef,useState } from 'react' import QrCreator from 'qr-creator' import icon from "./icon.png" function Create() { const [downloadbtn, setdownloadbtn] = useState(""); const txt=useRef() const img=useRef() let get=()=>{ QrCreator.render( { text:txt.current.value, radius:1.0, ecLevel:'H', fill:"black", background:"white", size:128 }, document.querySelector('#qr-code') ) console.log(img.current.toDataURL("image/jpeg")) setdownloadbtn(
Download
) } return (

Create QR Code

{downloadbtn}
) } export default Create
